snippet: A northern California sheriff's deputy shot a 13-year-old just three seconds after ordering him to drop a plastic replica of an assault rifle, the boy's parents claimed in an amended civil rights lawsuit filed Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Calif. Deputy Waited Seconds Before Shooting Boy With Toy Rifle: Lawsuit
headline.main: Calif. Deputy Waited Seconds Before Shooting Boy With Toy Rifle: Lawsuit

lead_paragraph: A northern California sheriff's deputy shot a 13-year-old just three seconds after ordering him to drop a plastic replica of an assault rifle, the boy's parents claimed in an amended civil rights lawsuit filed Tuesday.
